subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch and Kurt, his older brother, are the only two Nascar drivers with top-10 finishes in both of the season’s first two races.
snippet: Kyle Busch and Kurt, his older brother, are the only two Nascar drivers with top-10 finishes in both of the season’s first two races.
